scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Albums series (1961-2005) primarily consists invitations, letters, photographs, and some ephemera related to Bill Terry's career and home life. Three of the albums contain public relation and event materials related to the Coca-Cola Bottling Company during the 1960's in Fort Wayne, Indiana and San Jose, California. One of the albums includes photographs of a hotel, possibly the Marriott at Griffin Gate in Lexington, Kentucky, circa 1980. The final three albums include photographs of Terry's homes in Naples, Florida and Lexington, Kentucky during the 1990's and 2000's. With the photographs of the Lexington home are inventory sheets for various items in the house, like decor or fixtures.
